com.example.lunchmeet.lunchmeet

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.lunchmeet.lunchmeet.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to keep track of user information, such as their name, gender, and profile picture as taken from Facebook. Keeps track of the user's current state and allows or disallows certain actions based on the state. Provides getters and setters to manipulate user information.

      Default constructor to initialize user information.
